name: NS Mistercorporate
author: NsThemes

sections.description:
** THIS PLUGIN WORK ONLY WITH MISTERCORPORATE WORDPRESS THEME **

** GET THE FREE THEME! **
You can download Mistercorporate WordPress theme in the official WordPress repository https://wordpress.org/themes/mistercorporate/

This plugin allow you to add more features to this theme.
Activate this plugin and then go to Appearance -> Customize.
In “Mistercorporate Options” you can find:
– Quote section
– Try It section
– Newsletter section
– Adv section
– Price section
– Partner section
– Map section
– Contact section

Create and display this sections is very easy!
See the documentation here: http://mistercorporate.nsthemes.com/documentation/

For more information our visit official page NsThemes Marketplace.

We test our plugins with many other. If you find incompatibility with one specific plugin, please inform us at report@nsthemes.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘ns-mistercorporate’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. View admin menu, then click on ‘Appearance -> Customize’.
sections.faq:
Code is required to use this plugin?

No code require to use this plugin.

Can i use this plugin with different themes?

No, it’s still raccommended only to Mistercorporate WordPress theme.
